testimonial.description: Implemented the full-cycle development of the TekoAI chatbot, from concept design through to implementation and deployment
Completed the migration and upgrade of the IBM Rational product suite, ensuring seamless data transfer and minimal downtime.
Developed Warehouse and Dispatch modules for an MES and finacial model ERP logistic System to improve production management.
Played a pivotal role in the development of data bus platform products,  empowered the company to manage data and messages.
